plot: When Eli's case threatens Patti's old community, her cold shoulder causes a crisis of faith. The Jayson Turk trial arrives with an uncomfortable revelation for Dowd.

Eli's vision of earthquakes leads him to believe that the area in line for development by the man he is defending against the community is at risk. So he redoubles his efforts to have the area residents evicted. Meanwhile the trial of baseball star Turk comes to a conclusion that doesn't satisfy everyone involved.—Ron Kerrigan <mvg@whidbey.com>
